doc:
Gavin Muir (American actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gavin_Muir_(American_actor) 0 Gavin Muir (1900–1972) was an American film, television, and theatre actor.Although born in Chicago, Muir was educated in England and had a significant career on the Broadway stage through 1933. His first film appearance was in 1932 in a short film, then in John Ford's Mary of Scotland in 1936. His film career continued through 1965, often in character roles, and with a sort of specialty in villains with British accents. Gavin_Muir ( 1900 – 1972 ) was an_American_film , television , and theatre_actor.Although born in Chicago , Muir was_educated in England and had a_significant_career on the_Broadway_stage through 1933 . His_first_film_appearance was in 1932 in a_short_film , then in John_Ford 's_Mary of Scotland in 1936 . His_film_career continued through 1965 , often in character_roles , and with a_sort of specialty in villains with British_accents .
